name: Multiplayer FPS - Online
description:
[WARNING] : If you are stuck, or you see a blue screen, or something bugs out, press the "~" button, above the "Tab" button which will kill you and respawn.

NOTE: This is an FPS Game which is Multiplayer Online. You can play with your friends or with other people. This is just a test to see how the game works, not a real game which I would be proud of saying I made.

Controls:

Move = "W", "A", "S" and "D"

Shoot = Left Click

Change Weapon = 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5

Reload = "R" button

Zoom = Hold Right Click or Q

Sprint = Shift

Jump = Space

Climb Ladder = Space

Respawn = ~ Button

Chat = Return (Toggle Chat Mode, Click on Small Chat Window to type)
